In the first instance I believe you're saying it's part of your
requirement=
s that you output a useful message.  In this instance I would
test it but I=
 would test the exception class directly and *not* the code
that uses it.  =
The code that uses it I would just test that the correct
exception has been=
 raised.

In the second I would more than likely be wrapping the external e=
xception
anyway so that it doesn't leak into *my* domain
